doc.title: Operation Hvidvask
doc.plot: Revealing in great detail how the Danish shipping company Scandline for years has been sending it's used DSB-ferries to Bombay, India. Here they are being illegally broken up on the beaches under alarming conditions. What the hundreds of local shipbreakers don't know is that the interior of the ships are full of asbestos. Scanline never bothered to tell them, even though the majority of the people who originally build the ships in the 1960's now suffer from asbestosis.
